metadata.dc:author: Mietens, C
metadata.dc:description: Author reviews his personal experience on 189 cases of gastroenterocolitis produced by rotavirus during a two year period (1980-81). After exposing diagnostic and clinical features, he brings into consideration future possible therapy of this viral infection.
metadata.dc:title: Síntomas clínicos y posibilidades terapéuticas de las infecciones por rotavirus.
[Clinical symptoms and therapeutic possibilities in rotavirus infections].
